## BaseArtifactBooter.configure() method

Configure the Booter by initializing the 'dirs', 'extensions' and 'glob' properties.

NOTE: All properties are configured even if all aren't used.

**Signature:**

```typescript
configure(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
